sources.title: The Kid Ranger (1936) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, William Farnum, Joan Barclay
Director: Robert N. Bradbury

Ranger Ray plans to marry stage driver Bill Mason's daughter Mary, but unknown to Mary, twenty years earlier he killed her father as Sherif Mason.

metadata.Plot: Ranger Ray plans to marry stage driver Bill Mason's daughter Mary. Unknown to Mary, twenty years earlier when he was Sheriff Mason had to kill her father. Brent was there at the time and now he reappears. To keep the secret, he forces Mason to help him rob the stage. Ray breaks it up and after wounding a disguised Mason, goes for a Doctor. Returning he finds not only has Mason disappeared but also his daughter.
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, William Farnum, Joan Barclay
